Employee of Magic Research Institute:
We're not sure. All we know is that, when we use this new experimental summoning scroll, creatures appear, we think from another dimension.
The White Tigers are particularly interesting for our research, and we're rewarding anyone who can subdue them long enough for us to take a look.
It's not a difficult task, provided you've got the spine to stare down a White Tiger. Brrr... those eyes.


How can I help?
